Welcome to Local EnteroBase’s documentation!¶

The main purpose of this version is to enable our partners (users) to assemble their read files locally and send the strain metadata along with the assembly files to Warwick EnteroBase. The source code repository address is https://bitbucket.org/enterobase/local_enterobase/.
